Detailed Description

Set the Coefficients for Color Space Conversion.

struct Vps_CscCoeff

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_CscCoeff::addCoeff[VPS_CSC_NUM_COEFF]

Addition Coefficients {D0, D1, D2}}

UInt32 Vps_CscCoeff::mulCoeff[VPS_CSC_NUM_COEFF][VPS_CSC_NUM_COEFF]

Multiplication coefficients in the format {{A0, B0, C0}, {A1, B1, C1}, {A2, B2, C2}}
